查找在伊朗发布的所有帖子的创建日期、长度、语言、使用的浏览器、内容、图片文件以及地点名称和地点id，并按地点名称排序
output:
MATCH (p:Post)-[:PUBLISHED_IN]->(l:Location {name: '伊朗'}) 
RETURN p.creationDate, p.length, p.language, p.browser, p.content, p.imageFile, l.name AS locationName, l.id AS locationId
ORDER BY l.name

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找在伊朗发布的帖子的浏览器使用情况、内容、地点URL、语言、长度以及关系的创建日期
output:
MATCH (p:Post)-[:publishedIn]->(c:Country {name: 'Iran'}) 
WITH p, c
MATCH (p)-[:usedBrowser]->(b:Browser)
MATCH (p)-[:language]->(lang:Language)
RETURN p.content AS Content, p.url AS URL, p.length AS Length, p.creationDate AS CreationDate, b.name AS BrowserName, c.name AS CountryName, lang.name AS LanguageName

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找在伊朗发布的帖子的内容、位置IP、ID、图片文件、关系的创建日期、地点的URL、ID、名称、帖子的长度、使用的浏览器和语言，并按地点名称降序排列
output:
MATCH (p:Post)-[:PUBLISHED_IN|:LOCATED_AT]->(l:Location)
<-[:USED_BY]-(b:Browser)
<-[:USED_LANGUAGE]-(lang:Language)
RETURN p.content AS Content, p.ip AS IP, p.id AS PostID, p.image_file AS ImageFile, 
       p.created_at AS CreationDate, l.url AS LocationURL, l.id AS LocationID, l.name AS LocationName, 
       LENGTH(p.content) AS Length, b.name AS Browser, lang.name AS Language
ORDER BY l.name DESC

instruction:

MATCH (p:Post)-[:HAS_IMAGE]->(i:Image)
MATCH (p:Post)-[:HAS_LANGUAGE]->(l:Language)

instruction:

output: 基于这个假设的图模式，以下是一个Cypher查询，用于查找在伊朗发布的帖子的IP地址、图片文件、内容、长度和使用的浏览器信息：

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找在伊朗发布的帖子的创建日期、语言、地点URL、IP地址、ID、浏览器使用情况、图片文件和创建日期，最多返回12条记录
output:

RETURN p.creationDate, p.language, p.locationUrl, p.ipAddress, p.id, p.browserUsage, p.imageFile, p.creationDate

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找在伊朗发布的帖子的创建日期、地点URL、图片文件、地点ID、语言和内容
output:
MATCH (p:Post)-[:POSTED_AT]->(l:Location) 
  <-[:HAS_URL]-(url:URL) 
  <-[:HAS_IMAGE]-(image:ImageFile) 
  <-[:IN_LANGUAGE]-(lang:Language) 
  <-[:HAS_CONTENT]-(content:Content)
WHERE l.country = 'Iran'
RETURN p.creationDate, url.value, image.value, l.id, lang.name, content.value

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找在伊朗发布的帖子的信息，包括使用的浏览器、语言、位置URL、长度、创建日期、帖子ID、图片文件、关联关系的创建日期、IP地址和内容，按位置名称降序排列，限制返回3条记录。
output:
MATCH (p:Post)-[:RELEASED_IN]->(c:Country {name: "Iran"}) 
RETURN p.id AS PostID, p.browser, p.language, p.locationURL, p.length, p.creationDate, p.imageFile, r.creationDate AS RelationshipCreationDate, r.ipAddress, p.content
ORDER BY c.name DESC
LIMIT 3

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找在伊朗发布的帖子的图片文件、位置IP、创建日期和内容，返回17条记录
output:
MATCH (p:Post)-[:RELEASED_IN]->(c:Country {name: "Iran"}) 
<-[:CREATED_IN]-(i:Image)
<-[:FROM_IP]-(ip:IP)
<-[:CREATED_AT]-(date:Date)
<-[:HAS_CONTENT]-(content:Content)
RETURN p.imageFile, ip.ipAddress, date.dateValue, content.contentValue
LIMIT 17

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找在伊朗发布的帖子的信息，包括位置的id、关系的创建日期、位置的名称、帖子的IP地址、帖子的id、内容、长度、图片文件、创建日期和使用的浏览器。
output:
MATCH (p:Post)-[:PUBLISHED_AT]->(l:Location)
WHERE l.country = 'Iran'
RETURN p.id AS PostID, p.content AS Content, p.length AS Length, p.imageFile AS ImageFile, p.creationDate AS CreationDate, p.ipAddress AS IPAddress, p.browserUsed AS BrowserUsed, l.id AS LocationID, l.name AS LocationName, type(p) AS NodeType, type(l) AS LocationType, type(('PUBLISHED_AT')()) AS RelationshipType

instruction:

instruction:

查找与Etruscan_civilization标签相关的评论的内容、长度、浏览器使用情况、位置IP、创建日期以及标签的URL和ID，并按标签名称降序排列。返回值包括标签的URL、评论的内容、标签的名称、评论的ID、评论的长度、评论的浏览器使用情况、评论的位置IP、标签的ID、评论的创建日期和关系的创建日期。

MATCH (c:Comment)-[:HAS_TAG]->(t:Tag {name: 'Etruscan_civilization'})

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找与标签Adolf_Hitler相关的评论的标签名称、评论长度、标签URL、关系创建日期、标签ID、评论IP地址、评论创建日期、评论内容、评论ID，并限制结果数量为6条。
output:
MATCH (c:Comment)-[:RELATED_TO]->(l:Label {name: 'Adolf_Hitler'})
RETURN l.name AS LabelName, LENGTH(c.content) AS CommentLength, l.url AS LabelURL, c.created_at AS RelationshipCreationDate, l.id AS LabelID, c.ip AS CommentIPAddress, c.created_at AS CommentCreationDate, c.content AS CommentContent, c.id AS CommentID
LIMIT 6

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找包含John_F._Kennedy标签的评论的创建日期、标签id和使用的浏览器
output:
MATCH (c:Comment)-[:HAS_TAG]->(t:Tag {name: 'John_F._Kennedy'})
RETURN c.creationDate, t.id, c.browserUsed

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找与Andre Agassi标签相关的评论内容、评论的创建日期、标签的id和名称、评论的id，跳过前8条记录，返回接下来的15条记录
output:
MATCH (c:Comment)-[:HAS_TAG]->(t:Tag {name: 'Andre Agassi'})
RETURN c.content, c.creationDate, t.id, t.name, c.id
ORDER BY c.creationDate
SKIP 8
LIMIT 15

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找在Algeria地点下的评论信息，返回评论的创建日期、内容、地点的id和名称、评论的id、位置IP、浏览器使用情况、评论长度、评论创建日期以及地点的URL，并按地点名称排序。
output:
MATCH (l:Location {name: 'Algeria'})-[:HAS_REVIEW]->(r:Review)
RETURN r.creationDate, r.content, l.id, l.name, r.id, r.locationIP, r.browserUsage, LENGTH(r.content) as contentLength, r.creationDate, l.url
ORDER BY l.name

instruction:

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
在菲律宾发布的评论中，跳过前9条，返回接下来5条评论的创建日期、长度、使用的浏览器、IP地址以及评论的创建日期和ID
output:
MATCH (c:Comment)-[:RELEASED_IN]->(p:Place {name: "Philippines"})
WITH c
ORDER BY c.creationDate DESC
SKIP 9
LIMIT 5
RETURN c.creationDate AS creationDate, LENGTH(c.content) AS length, c.browserUsed AS browser, c.ipAddress AS ipAddress, c.id AS id

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找在斯威士兰发布的评论的创建日期、位置IP、长度、斯威士兰的URL、浏览器使用情况和评论内容

<-[:HAS_URL]-(url:URLs) 
<-[:USED_BY]-(browser:Browsers) 
RETURN c.createdDate, c.locationIP, c.length, url.url, browser.browser, c.content

instruction:

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找在菲律宾发表的评论的内容、评论的id、创建日期、位置IP、浏览器使用情况、长度，以及菲律宾的位置id、名称和关系的创建日期，并按菲律宾的名称排序

instruction:

output:

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找名为Emperor of Brazil且位于Santa Maria的人的创建日期、位置IP、所在地点名称、使用的浏览器、姓氏和语言，最多返回20条记录
output:
MATCH (p:Person {name: "Emperor of Brazil", location: "Santa Maria"})
RETURN p.creationDate, p.locationIP, p.locationName, p.browser, p.surname, p.language
LIMIT 20

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找居住在New Cairo的所有人的生日、语言、id、创建日期、位置关系的创建日期、地点名称、浏览器使用情况、地点id、名字、邮箱、网址、姓氏、性别和IP地址
output:
MATCH (p:Person)-[:LIVES_IN]->(l:Location {name: "New Cairo"})
RETURN p.birthday, p.language, p.id, p.creationDate, p.relationshipCreationDate, l.name, p.browserUsage, l.id, p.name, p.email, p.website, p.surname, p.gender, p.ipAddress

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找Wojciech认识的名叫Ali的人的创建日期、语言、姓氏和浏览器使用情况
output:
MATCH (p:Person {name: 'Wojciech'})-[:KNOWS]->(ali:Person {name: 'Ali'})
RETURN ali.createdDate, ali.language, ali.surname, ali.browserUsage

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找名为Wojciech的人的生日、姓氏、id、位置IP和创建日期，以及他认识的人的语言、位置IP、浏览器使用情况和关系的创建日期
output:
MATCH (p:Person {name: 'Wojciech'}) 
WITH p, 
    (p)-[:KNOWS]->(r:Relationship) 
RETURN p.name AS Name, 
       p.surname AS Surname, 
       p.id AS ID, 
       p.locationIP AS LocationIP, 
       p.creationDate AS CreationDate, 
       r.language AS Language, 
       r.locationIP AS RelationshipLocationIP, 
       r.browserUsage AS BrowserUsage, 
       r.creationDate AS RelationshipCreationDate

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找名为Wojciech的人及其认识的人的相关信息，包括他们的浏览器使用情况、生日、性别、创建日期、电子邮件、语言、位置IP以及关系的创建日期，限制返回10条结果。返回的信息包括：Wojciech的浏览器使用情况、生日、性别、创建日期、电子邮件、语言、位置IP、ID；他认识的人的浏览器使用情况、生日、性别、创建日期、位置IP、姓名、姓氏、ID。
output:
MATCH (woj:Person {name: 'Wojciech'})-[:KNOWS]->(person:Person)
RETURN woj.name AS WojciechName, woj.browser_usage AS WojciechBrowserUsage, 
       woj.birthdate AS WojciechBirthdate, woj.gender AS WojciechGender, 
       woj.creation_date AS WojciechCreationDate, woj.email AS WojciechEmail, 
       woj.language AS WojciechLanguage, woj.location_ip AS WojciechLocationIP, 
       woj.id AS WojciechID, 
       person.name AS PersonName, person.surname AS PersonSurname, 
       person.browser_usage AS PersonBrowserUsage, 
       person.birthdate AS PersonBirthdate, 
       person.gender AS PersonGender, 
       person.creation_date AS PersonCreationDate, 
       person.location_ip AS PersonLocationIP, 
       person.id AS PersonID
LIMIT 10

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找Wojciech认识的人的姓名，以及Wojciech使用的语言、创建日期，对方的创建日期、生日、浏览器使用情况、位置IP和性别
output:
MATCH (woj:Person {name: 'Wojciech'})-[:KNOWS]->(known:Person)
RETURN known.name AS KnownName,
       woj <-[:SPEAKS]-(lang:Language) AS Language,
       woj <-[:HAS_CREATED_DATE]-(date:CreatedDate) AS CreationDate,
       known <-[:HAS_CREATED_DATE]-(knownDate:CreatedDate) AS KnownCreationDate,
       known <-[:HAS_DATE_OF_BIRTH]-(birthday:DateOfBirth) AS Birthday,
       known <-[:HAS_BROWSER_USAGE]-(browser:BrowserUsage) AS BrowserUsage,
       known <-[:HAS_LOCATION]-(location:Location) AS LocationIP,
       known.gender AS Gender

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找名为Wojciech的人及其认识的人的详细信息，包括他们的名字、电子邮件、语言、位置IP、ID、性别、创建日期、生日和浏览器使用情况，限制返回6条记录。
output:
MATCH (p:Person {name: 'Wojciech'})-[:KNOWS]->(k:Person)
RETURN p.name AS PersonName, p.email AS Email, p.language AS Language, p.ip AS LocationIP, p.id AS ID, p.gender AS Gender, p.created AS CreatedDate, p.birthday AS Birthday, p.browser_usage AS BrowserUsage
LIMIT 6

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找Jose的好友关系，返回Jose的id、位置IP、浏览器、语言，以及他的好友的id和邮箱，还有他们关系的创建日期
output:
MATCH (jose:Person {name: 'Jose'})-[:FRIEND_OF]->(friend:Person)
RETURN
  jose.id AS JoseID,
  jose.locationIP AS JoseLocationIP,
  jose.browser AS JoseBrowser,
  jose.language AS JoseLanguage,
  friend.id AS FriendID,
  friend.email AS FriendEmail,
  jose.name AS JoseName,
  friend.name AS FriendName,
  type(jose)-[:FRIEND_OF]->(friend) AS RelationshipType,
  jose.created_at AS JoseCreatedAt,
  friend.created_at AS FriendCreatedAt

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找名为Ali的人认识的名为Francisco的人的生日、性别、Francisco的姓氏、Francisco的创建日期、Francisco的IP地址、Francisco使用的浏览器、关系的创建日期、Ali的语言、Ali的邮箱、Ali的创建日期、Ali的ID、Francisco的语言、Francisco的IP地址。
output:

RETURN f.birthday, f.gender, f.surname, f.createDate, f.ipAddress, f.browser, type(a), a.createDate, a.language, a.email, a.createDate, a.id, f.language, f.ipAddress

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找名为Emperor of Brazil的人喜欢的帖子的信息，包括该人的名字、邮箱、创建日期、语言、ID、位置IP、生日、性别、姓氏，以及帖子的长度、位置IP、内容、语言、创建日期、使用的浏览器，还有喜欢关系的创建日期。
output:
MATCH (p:Person {name: "Emperor of Brazil"})-[:LIKES]->(t:Post)
RETURN p.name AS Name, p.email AS Email, p.created_date AS CreationDate, p.language AS Language, p.id AS ID, p.location_ip AS LocationIP, p.birthday AS Birthday, p.gender AS Gender, p.surname AS Surname,
       t.length AS Length, t.location_ip AS PostLocationIP, t.content AS Content, t.language AS PostLanguage, t.created_date AS PostCreationDate, t.browser AS Browser, type(p)-[:LIKES]->t AS LikesCreationDate

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找名为Emperor of Brazil的人喜欢的帖子的信息，包括帖子的语言、浏览器、IP地址、id、内容、图片文件、长度，以及该人的语言、id、创建日期、IP地址、浏览器、性别、名字、姓氏、生日，还有喜欢操作的创建日期。
output:
MATCH (p:Post)-[:LIKES]->(person:Person {name: "Emperor of Brazil"})
RETURN p.language, p.browser, p.ip, p.id, p.content, p.image, p.length,
       person.language, person.id, person.creationDate, person.ip, person.browser, 
       person.gender, person.name, person.surname, person.birthdate, 
       p.likesCreationDate

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找名为Emperor of Brazil的人喜欢的帖子的内容、该人的浏览器使用情况、帖子的id、该人的IP地址、姓氏、电子邮件、id、性别、帖子的创建日期、长度、IP地址、生日、创建日期和语言信息，以及喜欢行为的创建日期。
output:
MATCH (p:Person {name: "Emperor of Brazil"}) 
WITH p
MATCH (p)-[:LIKES]->(post:Post) 
WITH p, post
MATCH (p)-[:USES]->(browser:BrowserUsage)
WITH p, post, browser
MATCH (p)-[:HAS_IP]->(ip:IP)
WITH p, post, browser, ip
RETURN post.content AS Content, 
       browser.browserUsage AS BrowserUsage, 
       post.id AS PostID, 
       ip.ipAddress AS IPAddress, 
       p.surname AS Surname, 
       p.email AS Email, 
       p.id AS PersonID, 
       p.gender AS Gender, 
       post.creationDate AS CreationDate, 
       post.length AS Length, 
       ip.ipAddress AS IPAddress, 
       p.birthday AS Birthday, 
       post.creationDate AS PostCreationDate, 
       post.language AS Language, 
       p.creationDate AS LikeCreationDate

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找Grigore喜欢的帖子的信息，包括Grigore使用的浏览器、他的名字、帖子使用的浏览器、Grigore的生日、帖子的创建日期以及Grigore的创建日期

  (p:Post)-[b:USED_BROWSER]->(browser:Browser),
  (g)-[u:USED_BROWSER]->(browser),
  (g)-[b:HAS_BIRTHDAY]->(birthday:Birthday),
  (p)-[c:CREATED_ON]->(post_date:Date),
  (g)-[c:CREATED_ON]->(user_date:Date)

instruction:
请将以下自然语言转换为图数据库的Cypher查询:
查找名为Mohamed的人喜欢的评论的长度、IP地址、id，以及该人的IP地址、生日、姓氏、语言、名字和id，还有评论的内容。

MATCH (p:Person {name: 'Mohamed'})-[:LIKES]->(c:Comment)
